title: Lagging for no reason.
body: So i want only to say (because that topic was touched one year or more ago). From new patch which is 6.24 im lagging for no reason. Having 59 ping and 250 fps. It looks like im teleporting from one to place to another (more often when i use spells). So if there is someone who want to help me, please respond! Thanks for your attention!{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

replies.body: It seems that your ping is fine, but you might be having packet loss that could cause that kind of teleporting that you describe.  Run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader)  on these matches to know for sure.  Let me know what you find!

in my last three games:

Your average percentage of packet loss for this game was 3.89%. ping average 38 (last night before i ragequit - was playing with friends, don't worry :D)

Your average percentage of packet loss for this game was 1.42%. Ping average 39

Your average percentage of packet loss for this game was 0.98%. Ping average 52(most recent)

Thanks for all of the details!  That post is pretty old, but  it does seem to be referencing network issues like packet loss.  Running a log reader instead was helpful, and it looks like you've got some sporadic loss of data in your games.  

Are you running on wi-fi?  Either your local network is having problems holding steady, or your ISP could be taking a long way to route to the game server.  When you get a chance, go over every step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help rule out possibilities. 

Test it out in custom games, and let me know how it goes.

after a bot match:

"Your average percentage of packet loss for this game was 0.61%. Average Ping around 33"

although lower loss, I still experienced the teleportation problem, just fewer times. My goal is to eliminate this problem altogether (because it never existed for me before the season 7 patch)

What I did: Added "league client" to list of exceptions in my windows firewall settings...It wasn't on the list before...although it should be - because I've had this game installed for quite some time without firewall problems.

I also updated my 'definitions' in windows defender-as per troubleshooting directions: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#section-windows

*will continue troubleshoot until i can play this game  - I'm too poor to play paid games :/

UPDATE: 

Downloaded hextech repair tool and 'forced a repatch'
Also, logged into router settings and manually forwarded the ports requiried (see ports listed in troubleshooting from link above)

rebooting pc and playing a match; will update after

UPDATE:

Rebooted router again after updating ports and running hextech repair tool...

BOT MATCH SUMMONERS RIFT A SUCCESS! 
Your average percentage of packet loss for this game was 0.21%

Did not experience any 'teleportation' for the first time! VERY EXCITE!

SHOUT OUT TO POROCLES FOR THE TROUBLESHOOTING TIPS! Must be a rito employee!

Having this problem as well since the start of season seven. Aparently it has happened before...a post from a while back...

*external link* (its reddit)

https://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/1c93p1/strange_lag_without_ping_delay/

My ping stays around 50, but the game freezes for a second, and then it resumes. Nearly impossible to play in a team fight when this is happening every 15 seconds...

I have seen some people complaining about GFX card problems on the new windows 10/new client. I have repair the game and still have the same issue. Never ever had this problem before season 7 update.

Intell i5 3.0ghz cpu
12gb Ram @ 1333
2gb GFX Radeon R9 270x
On a WIFI connection
Windows 10

^pretty sure this should be overkill for this games graphics. Shouldn't be lagging at all. Oh and this is the first time i've felt the need to post on the forums in 6 years of playing this game....if that tells you how put out i am :D

Tried: repairing, rebooting PC, rebooting router, updating GFX software.....all to no avail

TL;DR:

Season 7 update causing GFX problems. Screen lag when casting abilities / moving. Causing champs and minions to jump around the screen. Extremely disorienting in team fights.
